name: Light ACV (Hovercraft)
description: A light Air Cushion Vehicle suitable for swamps, water, and flat terrain negotiations. Typical frontier transport.

name: All-Terrain Vehicle (Tracked)
description: Rugged, pressurized tracked vehicle designed for hostile environments. Reliable workhorse of many colonies.

name: Tiltrotor Utility Aircraft
description: Standard atmospheric transport on many worlds. VTOL capability combined with turboprop speeds.

name: Main Battle Tank
description: Heavily armored tracked combat vehicle. Features composite armor and a hypervelocity main gun.

name: Civilian Ground Car
description: Standard wheeled or tracked commuter vehicle, electric or multifuel engine.

name: Frontier Submersible
description: Exploration submarine for aquatic worlds like Triton.
